text: Mohammad Bagher Ghalibaf or Mohammad Baqer Qalibaf (, born 23 August 1961) is an Iranian conservative politician. Ghalibaf has been the 23rd Speaker of the Parliament of Iran since 2020. He was the Mayor of Tehran from 2005 to 2017. He was cmmander of the Revolutionary Guards' Air Force from 1997 to 2000. He unsuccessfully ran for President of Iran in 2024. ==References== Category:1961 births Category:Living people Category:Speakers of the Islamic Consultative Assembly Category:Mayors of Tehran
title: Mohammad Bagher Ghalibaf
